application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to partial discharge of Condition 24 (Contamination) (Part (i) (a) and (b) only) required by planning permission ref: 73238/APP/2018/1145 dated 19-12-2019, for the demolition of existing buildings, site clearance and redevelopment to provide a mixed use scheme, including 457 residential units, 264 sqm (GEA) A1 retail use, 229 sqm (GEA) A3 cafe use and 2,273 sqm (GEA) B1 office, together with 237 car parking spaces and 1,070 cycle parking spaces, hard and soft landscaping, refuse and recycling facilities, and public and private amenity space (as amended by application ref: 73238/APP/2021/233 dated 12/03/21).
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that this application only relates to the partial discharge of Condition 24 (Part (i) (a) and (b) only and that further details would need to be submitted at a later stage to fully discharge the remaining parts of the condition (Parts (ii), (iii) and (iv)).
